General.Description: NEM is a peer-to-peer crypto platform that is written in Java and JavaScript with 100% native code. NEM has a stated goal of a broad distribution model and has introduced new features in blockchain technology in its POI algorithm. NEM also integrates secure P2P encrypted messaging, multiple signature accounts, and the Eigentrust ++ reputation system. NEM has undergone extensive alpha testing starting June 25, 2014, followed by a long and comprehensive beta test starting October 20, 2014. The NEM was finally launched on May 31, 2015.
General.Features: XEM coin has negligible transaction fees and times faster transaction times. It has a better scalability way, and it's safer. Besides, the whole financial ecosystem is developed around it (see DimCoin, Comsa, Bankera and more). Also, it is widely accepted by people and organizations, as it has been widely adopted in Japan and Malaysia, and the group is working to expand their activities throughout the United States and Europe. Moreover, it has a great development team and a CEO with a vision of doing
instead of investing money into marketing as most of the altcoins. They invest in development and physical presence in the market.
General.Technology: A completely unique implementation of blockchain technology: NEM was built from scratch as a powerful and rational platform for application developers of all kinds, not just as a digital currency. Using NEM in your application simply by executing RESTful JSON API calls allowing you to configure your own
and take advantage of NEM's powerful blockchain platform for fast, secure solution, and your scalability.
General.Sponsor: XEM coin is sponsored by Symmetry Fund. SYMM is a part of the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain. Besides, it is an ERC20-compliant smart contract.
